skillTree.name: Accusation
skillTree.description: The Witch Hunter levels his finger across the battlefield and accuses one of the enemy of arch-heresy!

ui_effects.description: âž•90% chance to deal 25 direct damage to 1 entity per second

skillTree.name: Grim Resolve
skillTree.description: A Witch Hunter is a stern, grim figure, that can rarely be rattled despite the horrors he faces.

skillTree.name: Magic Resistance
skillTree.description: The Witch Hunter keeps many blessed relics on his person to protect him against arcane attack.

skillTree.name: Tools of Judgement
skillTree.description: When attacking larger abominations, the Witch Hunter has the accoutrements to bring such beasts down.

skillTree.name: Sigmarâ€™s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this wardâ€™s bearer.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Retinue
skillTree.description: There are a wide variety of those - from the Colleges' Magisters Vigilant to local mercenaries, hired to a Witch Hunter's service.

ui_effects.description: âž• Summons a unit of Witch Hunters

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Silver Bullets
skillTree.description: The Witch Hunterâ€™s thrice-blessed silver bullets are the final judgement of the damned.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eyeâ€¦ something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

skillTree.name: Enemy of the Undead
skillTree.description: This one has a deep-seated hatred for the unliving. They have studied long and hard on how to best strike against them.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Undead

skillTree.name: Terrifying Presence
skillTree.description: The mere presence of the Witch Hunter shakes the foul into hesitation.

skillTree.name: Regular Maintenance
skillTree.description: You cannot pierce the heart of your enemy with a bullet fired from a dirty barrel.

skillTree.name: Purge the Guilty
skillTree.description: Prepare the firing squad. They have been judged.

skillTree.name: Arrange Favors
skillTree.description: Our underworld contacts have been bribed to supply our troops with the very best, and slip tainted supplies to our enemies.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +1%
	(enemy armies in region)

Vigour loss reduction: +3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Judgement
skillTree.description: Once judged guilty of heresy, enemy leaders find even their most loyal subordinates gazing warily upon them.

effects.description:
Leadership aura size: -20%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: Itâ€™s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes itâ€™s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: Theyâ€™ve all heard the stories of this oneâ€™s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +1%
	(all characters factionwide)

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores up to 1575 Hit Points
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
âž• Restores up to 450 Hit Points
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Regal
backgroundSkills.description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.

backgroundSkills.name: Noble
backgroundSkills.description: "The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperious
backgroundSkills.description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!

effects.description: Leadership: +5 when in own or allied territory

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Tracker
backgroundSkills.description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Kill the Heretics!
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos is nothing against our iron will!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Burn the Undead!
backgroundSkills.description: Those corpses will burn and only ash will remain.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Defender of Men
backgroundSkills.description: Walls can't dodge!

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when under siege
	(all units in army)

Ammunition: +10% when defending
	(all units in army)

Reload time reduction: +10% when defending
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Basic Training
backgroundSkills.description: The training of even basic troops is important because all hands are needed in these dangerous times.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers, Wolf-Kin and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +2 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers, Wolf-Kin and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperial Calibration
backgroundSkills.description: They will not know what hit them!

effects.description:
Range: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knight Heritage
backgroundSkills.description: Knights of the Empire have strong bloodlines.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15% for cavalry units
	(all units in army)
